Kanshudo_mnemonic: with fast work (巩) the leather (革) becomes firm
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: An ordinary part of everyone's work is to try to strengthen their skills day by day.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " leather " and " gong ", the original meaning is to bind things with cooked cowhide. "Shuowen": "Yi Wei Shuye. "Yi" says: Gong uses the leather of oxen. Congge, Gongsheng." "Yi‧ Ge": "Gong uses the leather of oxen." Gao Heng's note: "Gong, It's bound and bound."

" Gong " also refers to the belt of the bundle. Ming Shen Jing's "Shuangzhu Tale-Warlock Mystery": "Relief is like going to Gong."

" Gong " can mean firmness. "Poetry‧Daya‧Zhanmao": "Looking at Haotian, no one can overcome it." Mao Chuan: "Gong, solid."

" Gong " also means hard work. "Wen Xuan-Ban Gu "Dian Yin": "Rong Jing universe, respect death and excitement, is the beginning of pious, Gong Laoqian, conscientious work." Cai Yong's note: "Gong Yi Lao Ye."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " leather " and " gong ", the original meaning is to bind things with cooked cowhide.
humanum_full_description:
從「革」，「巩」聲，本義為用熟牛皮束物。《說文》：「以韋束也。《易》曰：鞏用黃牛之革。从革，巩聲。」《易‧革》：「鞏用黃牛之革。」高亨注：「鞏，束而縛之也。」

　　「鞏」也指束物的皮帶。明沈鯨《雙珠記‧術士玄謀》：「救災厄如去鞏。」

　　「鞏」可表示牢固。《詩‧大雅‧瞻卬》：「藐藐昊天，無不克鞏。」毛傳：「鞏，固也。」

　　「鞏」也表示勤勞。《文選‧班固〈典引〉》：「榮鏡宇宙，尊亡與亢，乃始虔鞏勞謙，兢兢業業。」蔡邕注：「鞏亦勞也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「革」，「巩」聲，本義為用熟牛皮束物。

從「 革 」，「 巩 」聲，本義為用熟牛皮束物。《說文》：「以韋束也。《易》曰：鞏用黃牛之革。从革，巩聲。」《易‧革》：「鞏用黃牛之革。」高亨注：「鞏，束而縛之也。」 「 鞏 」也指束物的皮帶。明沈鯨《雙珠記‧術士玄謀》：「救災厄如去鞏。」 「 鞏 」可表示牢固。《詩‧大雅‧瞻卬》：「藐藐昊天，無不克鞏。」毛傳：「鞏，固也。」 「 鞏 」也表示勤勞。《文選‧班固〈典引〉》：「榮鏡宇宙，尊亡與亢，乃始虔鞏勞謙，兢兢業業。」蔡邕注：「鞏亦勞也。」
From the sound of " leather" and " gong", the original meaning is to bind things with cooked cowhide. "Shuowen": "Yi Wei Shuye. "Yi" says: Gong uses the leather of oxen. Congge, Gongsheng." "Yi‧ Ge": "Gong uses the leather of oxen." Gao Heng's note: "Gong, It's bound and bound." " Gong" also refers to the belt of the bundle. Ming Shen Jing's "Shuangzhu Tale-Warlock Mystery": "Relief is like going to Gong." " Gong" can mean firmness. "Poetry‧Daya‧Zhanmao": "Looking at Haotian, no one can overcome it." Mao Chuan: "Gong, solid." " Gong" also means hard work. "Wen Xuan-Ban Gu "Dian Yin": "Rong Jing universe, respect death and excitement, is the beginning of pious, Gong Laoqian, conscientious work." Cai Yong's note: "Gong Yi Lao Ye."

鞏字的基本解释

鞏
gǒng
见“巩”。

鞏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gǒng］
［《廣韻》居悚切，上腫，見。］
(1)用熟牛皮束物。
(2)指束物的皮带。
(3)巩固，牢固。
(4)勤劳。
(5)通“恐”。恐惧。
(6)用同“栱”。建筑物立柱与横梁之间成弓形的承重结构。
(7)用同“拱”。参见“鞏衛”。
(8)春秋古国名。故址在今河南省巩县境。
(9)姓。春秋有晋大夫巩朔。见《左传·成公三年》。

鞏字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【革字部】　鞏； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1387第28
【唐韻】【正韻】居竦切【集韻】【韻會】古勇切，?音拱。【說文】以韋束也。【易·革卦】鞏用黃牛之革。　又【爾雅·釋詁】鞏，固也。【又】硈，鞏也。【註】硈然堅固。【詩·大雅】藐藐昊天，無不克鞏。　又【揚子·方言】鞏，火乾也。凡有汁而乾謂之煎，東齊謂之鞏。　又國名。【左傳·昭十五年】闕鞏之甲，武所以克商也。【註】闕鞏國所出鎧。　又【廣韻】縣名。【左傳·昭二十五年】尹文公涉於鞏。【註】於鞏縣涉洛水也。　又羌名。【前漢·趙充國傳】煎鞏，黃羝之屬。【後漢·順帝紀】討鞏唐羌。　又州名。【韻會】唐渭州，宋攺鞏州。　又姓。【左傳·成二年】晉侯使鞏朔獻齊捷於周。

鞏字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鞏字的起名意思

暂无。

Gong
Basic explanation of words
Gong
gǒng
See "Gong".
Gong
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gǒng］
["Guangyun" is horrified and swollen on the top, see you. ]
(1) Use cooked cowhide to bind things.
(2) Refers to the belt of the bundle.
(3) Consolidation and firmness.
(4) Hardworking.
(5) Through "fear". fear.
(6) Use the same as "栱". The arch-shaped load-bearing structure between the building column and the beam.
(7) Use the same "arch". See "Gong Wei".
(8) The name of the ancient country in Spring and Autumn. The former site was in Gongxian County, Henan Province.
(9) Last name. In the Spring and Autumn Period, there was Dr. Gong Shuo of Shanxi. See "Zuo Zhuan·Three Years of Cheng Gong".
Gong
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Ge Zi】　 Gong; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1387 28
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Ju Yu cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Gu Yong cut,? Sound arch. [Said the text] Yi Wei Shu also. [Yi·Ge Hexagram] Gong uses the leather of scalpers.　[Erya·Shixu] Gong, Gu Ye. [Also] Yan, Gong Ye. [Note] It is sturdy. 【Poetry·Daya】Liao Liao Hao Tian, without fail.　[Yangtze Dialect] Gong, the fire is dry. Where there is juice and dried, it is called fried, and Dongqi is called Gong.　 Also the name of the country. [Zuo Zhuan·15th Year of Zhao] The Jia of Que Gong, Wu is also a master of business. [Note] Armor produced by Que Gong.　[Guangyun] The name of the county. [Zuo Zhuan·Twenty-five Years] Yin Wengong was involved in Gong. [Note] Sheluoshui in Yugong County.　And Qiang name. [Previous Han·Zhao Chongguo Biography] Jian Gong, a genus of Huang Xi. [Later Han·Shun Di Ji] Discuss Gong Tang Qiang.　Also the name of the state. [Rhyme Club] Tang Weizhou, Song Din Gongzhou.　Another last name. [Zuo Zhuan·Two Years] The envoy of Jin Hou Gong Shuo offered the victory to Zhou.
